msg: Add new memory manager to ProjectBuilder project

author: jberry
msg: Use new MemoryManagerArrayImpl to allocate memory when it must be able to be deleted via delete [].

author: jberry
msg: Add new memory allocator that allocates using new[], for use where returned memory must be able to be deleted using delete []. This saves duplicated code in cases where a routine is optionally called with a specific memory manager, such as in the case of transcode
